attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, particularly in Asia and Africa, the HIV problem is exacerbated by the fact that doses of HIV medication is only suitable for adults. As a result, medical staff are using the naked eye to judge the amount suitable for children. Such a simple campaign will make a lot of difference, to what is becoming a truly mammoth problem. We at the India Development Trust, a UK based charity, are campaigning for a more effective use of medicine available to combat HIV/AIDS.
